Text: Thanks for still uploading som fs 9 stuff
for some reason, when I choose the aircraft it causes FSX to crash. I have looked for solutions but nothing helps. I am curious if anyone has this problem and could provide a solution.
I get the same problem Marick. I have used an older version of this software in the past (it is a great addon) and didn't have any issues. Maybe try an older version and see if it works for you.
